headline: How The PulteGroup (PHM) Story Is Evolving As Fair Value And Street Views Shift
summary: Why the PulteGroup Fair Value View Has Shifted The fair value estimate for PulteGroup has moved slightly, from about US$139.31 to about US$140.92 per share, reflecting updated assumptions around how the story could play out from here. Behind that change, the discount rate is now about 8.67% instead of about 8.62%, and revenue is now modeled at about 2.31% growth rather than a 1.16% decline, as analysts weigh a generally constructive tone against ongoing caution on housing demand and building...
